Class w3c.thotlib.SampleAction 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.thotlib.SampleAction
public class SampleAction
extends Object
implements Action
Java template for classes used to provide "user defined" specific actions. E.g. to redefine of extend the action of a menu item.

The purpose of this class is to be inherited to build Action as defined in w3c.thotlib.Action

Please see the w3c.thotlib.Action template class for all the the callback method definitions.

SampleAction()

callback(int, int)
callbackAttribute(int, int, long, long, long, int)
callbackDialog(int, int, int)
callbackElement(int, int, long, long, int, int)
callbackElementType(int, int, long, long, int, long, int)
callbackMenu(int, int)
callbackNotify(int)
callbackPresentation(int, int, long, long, int)
callbackTarget(int, int, long, long, int)
callbackValue(int, int, long, long, int)
callbackWindow(int, int, int, int, int)
main(String[])
The main will auto register with the Action name given as the argument.
register(String)
The register method exports the class callback when the action "ActionName" is to be called.
registerMenu(String)
The register method exports the class callback when the menu action "ActionName" is to be called.
unregister(String)
Unregister the "ActionName" action.

SampleAction 
 public SampleAction()

register 
 public void register(String ActionName)
The register method exports the class callback when the action "ActionName" is to be called.

Parameters:
ActionName - the name under which it should be registered.
registerMenu 
 public void registerMenu(String ActionName)
The register method exports the class callback when the menu action "ActionName" is to be called.

Parameters:
ActionName - the name under which it should be registered.
unregister 
 public void unregister(String ActionName)
Unregister the "ActionName" action.

Parameters:
ActionName - the name under which it had been registered.
callback 
 public int callback(int document,
                     int view)
callbackMenu 
 public int callbackMenu(int document,
                         int view)
callbackNotify 
 public int callbackNotify(int event)

                           int document,
                           int view)
callbackWindow 
 public int callbackWindow(int event,
                           int document,
                           int view,
                           int verticalValue,
                           int horizontalValue)

 public int callbackAttribute(int event,
                              int document,
                              long element,
                              long attribute,
                              long sschema,
                              int type)
callbackElement 
 public int callbackElement(int event,
                            int document,
                            long element,
                            long sschema,
                            int type,
                            int position)
callbackElementType 
 public int callbackElementType(int event,
                                int document,
                                long element,
                                long newsschema,
                                int newtype,
                                long sschema,
                                int type)

 public int callbackTarget(int event,
                           int document,
                           long element,

                          int value)

 public int callbackPresentation(int event,
                                 int document,
                                 long element,
                                 long pRule,
                                 int pRuleType)
main 
 public static int main(String args[])
The main will auto register with the Action name given as the argument.

Parameters:
args - the array of String given as argument.
